sections.text: Funds appropriated for any period ending on June 30 of a given year for actual transportation expenses for ch

79-1143.Fiscal year for purposes of act.

The fiscal year for all programs reimbursed pursuant to the Special Education Act shall begin on September 1 of each year and end on August 31 of the following year. Funds appropriated for any period ending on June 30 of a given year for actual transportation expenses for children with disabilities pursuant to section 79-1129 may be spent or obligated through August 31 of that year for such purpose.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 487, ยง 15;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-3332.01;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 825;Laws 1997, LB 346, ยง 31.

Cross ReferencesSchool fiscal year, see section 79-1091.
